name: Lionesse Beauty Bar
overview:
We have a very simple philosophy. When you visit us at Lionesse Beauty Bar, you will be spoilt and be treated like a princess, because this is what you deserve. Our mission is to carry out our business in a professional, caring and relaxed atmosphere whilst maintaining a premier service and knowing that your experience has been a special one. Because you are important to us, we will never compromise on quality; so we use only the highest quality beauty products. Vibes As soon as you step through the doors of the elegant and swanky Lionesse Beauty Bar you will experience its unique atmosphere. With DJ bar and refreshments you will feel a sense of wellbeing and calmness. We transport you to a world of beauty where your satisfaction and total contentment are essential.

Professional Service At the Lionesse Beauty Bar, our teams of highly trained professional beauty experts, hair stylists, makeup artists and estheticians will listen to what you want and advise and recommend what options are best for you. Our hair stylists will let you select the style you want; but will also recommend from a range of hairstyles from all over the world as well as letting you choose the hairstyle of your favorite celebrities. You will receive either a full or part makeover by one of our skilled beauticians, who will use our high quality, yet competitively priced beauty products on your skin. If you purchase any of our beauty products, your makeover is complimentary. Lionesse Beauty Bar has a large choice of beauty products for you to try and purchase and our licensed beauty experts will recommend what they believe is suitable for your skin type.
We also supply a range of hair tools, including top of the range professional straightening irons. Our 1.5” Red Tourmaline and 2” Red Tourmaline high-tech straightening irons use advanced infrared technology to prevent any harm to your hair as well as protecting colored hair.

Customer Experience A visit to the Lionesse Beauty Bar is your chance to experience and enjoy culture and style while you shop and will guarantee that the time you spend in our company will make this day exceptional. Schedule an appointment; but if you are passing and fancy a spontaneous makeover we will be thrilled to welcome you with our full “on the go” beauty service which includes hair styling and makeup.

Membership Because your visit to the Lionesse Beauty Bar will be special, we know that you will want to return as often as you can, so we have some discounted monthly memberships, which will allow you to visit a few times each month and to buy our outstanding beauty products at reduced prices. The Lionesse Beauty Bar hosts parties, so if you want to come along with a group of your girlfriends, either for a special event or just to chill, we offer a number of reasonably priced packages. To hear all of our latest news and to be first to know about our great offers and discounts, remember to Like our Facebook page.
